Articles.Content:
I've had a couple of occasions, when flying an aircraft, where something just 'fell off' as if decoupled.  (No decouplers of any sort on the craft).

One was a large undercarriage wheel and the other a Goliath engine attached to wings.  Both very similar test variants of the same craft.  Flying relatively straight and level, and having had several successful test flights previously.

Anyone else had this?

Edited April 15, 2023 by pandaman
